<template src="./template.html"></template>
<style src="./style.css"></style>
<script>
    import { useOsStore } from '../../stores/os.store'

    export default {
        name: "TaskBar",
        data() {
            return {
                currentTime: '',
                timer: null
            }
        },    
        computed: {
            osStore() {
                return useOsStore()
            }
        },
        methods: {
            updateTime() {
        const now = new Date()
        this.currentTime = now.toLocaleTimeString('ru-RU', { 
          hour: '2-digit', 
          minute: '2-digit' 
        })
      },
      
      getAppIcon(appName) {
        const icons = {
          notepad: 'üìù',
          explorer: 'üìÅ',
          calculator: 'üßÆ',
          settings: '‚öôÔ∏è'
        }
        return icons[appName] || 'üìÑ'
      },
      
      focusWindow(windowId) {
        this.osStore.activeWindowId = windowId
      },
      
      toggleStartMenu() {
        console.log('–ú–µ–Ω—é –ü—É—Å–∫')
      }
    },
    
    mounted() {
      this.updateTime()
      this.timer = setInterval(this.updateTime, 1000)
    },
    
    beforeUnmount() {
      if (this.timer) {
        clearInterval(this.timer)
      }
    }
  }
</script>
